subject: Athletics and Sports
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: With two injured starters sidelined and with few able bodies on its bench, Pittsburgh seemed ripe for the taking Wednesday night, but St. John’s was, instead, soundly beaten.
snippet: With two injured starters sidelined and with few able bodies on its bench, Pittsburgh seemed ripe for the taking Wednesday night, but St. John’s was, instead, soundly beaten.
